class.rdfs:comment: Fitness-related activity designed for a specific health-related purpose, including defined exercise routines as well as activity prescribed by a clinician.
class.rdfs:label: ExercisePlan

schema:activityDuration.rdfs:comment: Length of time to engage in the activity.
schema:activityDuration.rdfs:label: activityDuration

schema:activityFrequency.rdfs:comment: How often one should engage in the activity.
schema:activityFrequency.rdfs:label: activityFrequency

schema:additionalVariable.rdfs:comment: Any additional component of the exercise prescription that may need to be articulated to the patient. This may include the order of exercises, the number of repetitions of movement, quantitative distance, progressions over time, etc.
schema:additionalVariable.rdfs:label: additionalVariable

schema:exerciseType.rdfs:comment: Type(s) of exercise or activity, such as strength training, flexibility training, aerobics, cardiac rehabilitation, etc.
schema:exerciseType.rdfs:label: exerciseType

schema:intensity.rdfs:comment: Quantitative measure gauging the degree of force involved in the exercise, for example, heartbeats per minute. May include the velocity of the movement.
schema:intensity.rdfs:label: intensity

schema:repetitions.rdfs:comment: Number of times one should repeat the activity.
schema:repetitions.rdfs:label: repetitions

schema:restPeriods.rdfs:comment: How often one should break from the activity.
schema:restPeriods.rdfs:label: restPeriods

schema:workload.rdfs:comment: Quantitative measure of the physiologic output of the exercise; also referred to as energy expenditure.
schema:workload.rdfs:label: workload
